page.shortlink: ux controlbar items clipping rectangle right property
page.description: The distance in pixels from the right side of the screen to the right edge of the clipping rectangle.

discussion.p: Defines the distance between the right side of the clipping rectangle and the screen. For example, if a value of 50 is specified for the *[ui:right]* property, the right edge of the clipping rectangle with be 50 pixels from the right side of the screen.
